projects.name: Vesta Project
projects.cost: two triples in a row. Can't be purchased if you haven't built another card this turn

projects.name: Te Kore Project
projects.cost: two sets of four of a kind

projects.name: Quetzalcoatl Project
projects.cost: ten even dice or ten odd dice. Preserved die counts as two dice.

projects.name: Herus Project
projects.cost: six in a row. Can't be purchased if you activated Command Center this turn.

baseColony.name: Headquarter
baseColony.effect: Start of turn: Roll 4 Basic dice

baseColony.name: Command Center
baseColony.effect: Click: Reroll all selected basic dice

baseColony.name: Forge
baseColony.effect: Click: Three in a row > Gain a perserved Wild die

blueprints.name: Minor Settlement
blueprints.effect: Start of even round: Roll a Basic die

blueprints.effect: Start of turn: Gain a fixed 3

blueprints.effect: Start of turn: Gain a fixed 2

blueprints.name: Dome
blueprints.effect: Start of turn: Roll a basic dice and preserve it

blueprints.name: Prospector
blueprints.effect: Start of turn: Roll a die, fix and preserve it

blueprints.name: Shuttle
blueprints.effect: Enter play: +2 M.O.D. You may mod 6 into 1 or 1 into 6

blueprints.name: Replicant Robot
blueprints.effect: Start of turn: Gain a wild die

blueprints.name: Quantum Computer
blueprints.effect: Click: Reroll all selected basic dice.

blueprints.name: Monopole
blueprints.cost: three odd. All your other dices must be odd
blueprints.effect: Start of turn: Gain a fixed die of odd value.

blueprints.name: Reactor20
blueprints.effect: Click: 1 dice>Split its value into 2 dice

blueprints.name: Energy Saver
blueprints.effect: End of turn: If you have two more dice, roll two extra in the next turn

blueprints.name: Recycing
blueprints.effect: when you spend a wild die, roll an extra at the start of next round.

blueprints.name: Tourist Attraction
blueprints.effect: Start of turn: Roll one extra dice per project built

blueprints.name: Selfrepair Material
blueprints.effect: End of turn: If you have no non-preserved dice, roll two more in the next turn

blueprints.name: Observatory
blueprints.effect: Enter play: draw a card. Gain 1 more M.O.D. when you discard a card

blueprints.name: Dormant Chamber
blueprints.effect: Click: A die > fix and preserve it.

blueprints.name: Prototype
blueprints.effect: Start of turn: Gain a fixed die of random value.

blueprints.name: Reactor25
blueprints.effect: Click: 1 die > a die of its value + 1 and a die of its value - 1

blueprints.name: Extractor
blueprints.effect: Click: A pair > A Preserved Wild

blueprints.name: Settlement
blueprints.effect: Start of turn: Roll a basic die

blueprints.name: Bionic Robot
blueprints.effect: When reroll: If exactly one die is rerolled, gain a basic die

blueprints.name: ThreeD Printer
blueprints.effect: Click: 1 > A wild die

blueprints.name: Transporter
blueprints.effect: Start of turn: +1 M.O.D.

blueprints.name: OMNI
blueprints.effect: Start of turn: gain and preserve a wild die.

blueprints.name: Reactor16
blueprints.effect: 2 dice>equally distribute their value
